mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM clients WHERE email = #{email}) THEN 'CLIENT' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM agents WHERE email = #{email}) THEN 'AGENT' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admins WHERE email = #{email}) THEN 'ADMIN' ELSE NULL END AS user_type
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients WHERE email = #{email}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agents WHERE email = #{email}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admins WHERE email = #{email}) AS count

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clients WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agents WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admins WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}) AS count

SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.password, u.phone_number, u.address, u.role, u.email_verified, u.created_at, u.updated_at, u.verification_code FROM ( SELECT * FROM clients WHERE verification_code = #{verificationCode} UNION ALL SELECT * FROM agents WHERE verification_code = #{verificationCode} UNION ALL SELECT * FROM admins WHERE verification_code = #{verificationCode} ) AS u LIMIT 1
